French Prime Minister Gabriel Attal told parliament that Ukraine's fight against the Russian invasion had hit a "tipping point", warning of "real, tangible dangers" for France should Russia defeat Kyiv's forces.https://t.co/RzQJphk3ED pic.twitter.com/4p4Kueqxev
